pharmacy.title: Pharmacy
pharmacy.description: Healthcare-focused analysis. Priority given to hospital proximity, elderly population density and transportation ease.

bakery.title: Bakery
bakery.description: Daily needs-focused analysis. Residential density, pedestrian traffic and competitor analysis are prioritized.

market.title: Market
market.description: Retail-focused analysis. Population density, income level and parking facilities are evaluated.

cafe.title: Cafe
cafe.description: Social venue-focused analysis. Priority given to young population, student density and social activity areas.

restaurant.title: Restaurant
restaurant.description: Food service-focused analysis. Business center proximity, income level and evening traffic are evaluated.
